sqlMap.select: SELECT ROWNUM NUM, COURSECODE , SUBJSEQ , SUBJNAME , SUBJTYPE , LECHOUR , PATHOUR , ETCHOUR , EDUCONTENTS , NVL(ORD, 0) AS ORD, DISPORDER FROM OPR_LECSUBJECT A, (SELECT CODE, DISPORDER FROM SYS_SYSTEMCODE WHERE CODEDIV = '00023') B WHERE A.SUBJTYPE = B.CODE(+) AND COURSECODE = #coursecode# ORDER BY DISPORDER, SUBJTYPE, ORD, SUBJNAME

SELECT A.COURSECODE, YEAR, COURSENAME, CRSTYPE1, CRSTYPE2, CRSTYPE3, EDUOBJECTIVES, EDUWAY, EDUTARGET, EDUCOUNT, CHARGER, LECROOMNO, to_char(to_date(EDUFROM,'YYYYMMDD'), 'MM.DD') EDUFROM, to_char(to_date(EDUTO,'YYYYMMDD'), 'MM.DD') EDUTO, A.DAYCOUNT, A.TERMDESC, to_char(to_date(REQFROM,'YYYYMMDD'), 'MM.DD') REQFROM, to_char(to_date(REQTO,'YYYYMMDD'), 'MM.DD') REQTO, BASEYYMM, CHPTCOUNT, APVHOUR, CYBERPRGSRATE , CYBERMINHOUR, CYBERFINBASE, CYBERFINNOTICE, OPRDEPART, OPRDEPTTELNO, B.TYPECNT1, B.TYPECNT2, B.TYPECNT3, B.WAYCNT1, B.WAYCNT2, B.WAYCNT3, ROUND(B.TYPECNT1*100/(B.TYPECNT1+B.TYPECNT2+B.TYPECNT3)) TYPERATE1, ROUND(B.TYPECNT2*100/(B.TYPECNT1+B.TYPECNT2+B.TYPECNT3)) TYPERATE2, ROUND(B.WAYCNT1*100/(B.WAYCNT1+B.WAYCNT2+B.WAYCNT3)) WAYRATE1, ROUND(B.WAYCNT2*100/(B.WAYCNT1+B.WAYCNT2+B.WAYCNT3)) WAYRATE2, CASE WHEN CRSTYPE1 = '00003' AND CRSTYPE3 = '00002' THEN C.TYPENAME || '(민간)' ELSE C.TYPENAME END CRSTYPE FROM OPR_LECTURE A, (SELECT COURSECODE, SUM(DECODE(SUBJTYPE,'00002', (NVL(LECHOUR,0)+NVL(PATHOUR,0)+NVL(ETCHOUR,0)),0)) AS TYPECNT1, SUM(DECODE(SUBJTYPE,'00001', (NVL(LECHOUR,0)+NVL(PATHOUR,0)+NVL(ETCHOUR,0)),0)) AS TYPECNT2, SUM(DECODE(SUBJTYPE,'00003', (NVL(LECHOUR,0)+NVL(PATHOUR,0)+NVL(ETCHOUR,0)),0)) AS TYPECNT3, SUM(NVL(LECHOUR,0)) AS WAYCNT1, SUM(NVL(PATHOUR,0)) AS WAYCNT2, SUM(NVL(ETCHOUR,0)) AS WAYCNT3 FROM OPR_LECSUBJECT A, SYS_SYSTEMCODE B WHERE A.SUBJTYPE = B.CODE(+) AND B.CODEDIV(+) = '00023' AND A.COURSECODE = #coursecode# GROUP BY COURSECODE ) B, (SELECT TYPE1, MAX(TYPENAME) TYPENAME FROM CMN_COURSETYPE WHERE TYPE2 = '00000' AND TYPE3 = '00000' GROUP BY TYPE1) C WHERE A.COURSECODE = B.COURSECODE(+) AND A.CRSTYPE1 = C.TYPE1(+) AND A.COURSECODE = #coursecode#

SELECT A.COURSECODE, YEAR, COURSENAME, CRSTYPE1, CRSTYPE2, CRSTYPE3, EDUOBJECTIVES, EDUWAY, EDUTARGET, EDUCOUNT, CHARGER, LECROOMNO, to_char(to_date(EDUFROM,'YYYYMMDD'), 'MM.DD') EDUFROM, to_char(to_date(EDUTO,'YYYYMMDD'), 'MM.DD') EDUTO, A.DAYCOUNT, A.TERMDESC, to_char(to_date(REQFROM,'YYYYMMDD'), 'MM.DD') REQFROM, to_char(to_date(REQTO,'YYYYMMDD'), 'MM.DD') REQTO, BASEYYMM, CHPTCOUNT, APVHOUR, CYBERPRGSRATE , CYBERMINHOUR, CYBERFINBASE, CYBERFINNOTICE, OPRDEPART, OPRDEPTTELNO, B.TYPECNT1, B.TYPECNT2, B.TYPECNT3, B.WAYCNT1, B.WAYCNT2, B.WAYCNT3, CASE WHEN CRSTYPE1 = '00003' AND CRSTYPE3 = '00002' THEN C.TYPENAME || '(민간)' ELSE C.TYPENAME END CRSTYPE FROM OPR_LECTURE A, (SELECT COURSECODE, SUM(DECODE(SUBJTYPE,'00002', (NVL(LECHOUR,0)+NVL(PATHOUR,0)+NVL(ETCHOUR,0)),0)) AS TYPECNT1, SUM(DECODE(SUBJTYPE,'00001', (NVL(LECHOUR,0)+NVL(PATHOUR,0)+NVL(ETCHOUR,0)),0)) AS TYPECNT2, SUM(DECODE(SUBJTYPE,'00003', (NVL(LECHOUR,0)+NVL(PATHOUR,0)+NVL(ETCHOUR,0)),0)) AS TYPECNT3, SUM(NVL(LECHOUR,0)) AS WAYCNT1, SUM(NVL(PATHOUR,0)) AS WAYCNT2, SUM(NVL(ETCHOUR,0)) AS WAYCNT3 FROM OPR_LECSUBJECT A, SYS_SYSTEMCODE B WHERE A.SUBJTYPE = B.CODE(+) AND B.CODEDIV(+) = '00023' AND A.COURSECODE = #coursecode# GROUP BY COURSECODE ) B, (SELECT TYPE1, MAX(TYPENAME) TYPENAME FROM CMN_COURSETYPE WHERE TYPE2 = '00000' AND TYPE3 = '00000' GROUP BY TYPE1) C WHERE A.COURSECODE = B.COURSECODE(+) AND A.CRSTYPE1 = C.TYPE1(+) AND A.COURSECODE = #coursecode#
